name: My 'West Wing' Quiz: The Sequel | Television | 15 Questions

questions.text: To whom was Sam referring to when he said, "You could make a good dog break his leash"?
questions.explanation:
Ainsley.

	Charlie told Sam he'd kill him if Sam said that to Deanna.

questions.text: What did Sam buy Laurie for her law school graduation?
questions.explanation:
briefcase.

	The President asked Sam to tell Laurie that the AG would personally see to it that Laurie would be accepted to the bar. He also told Sam to tell congratulate on her on his behalf for earning her law degree.

questions.text: Who gave CJ a goldfish pin for Christmas?
questions.explanation:
Danny.

	Danny was dressed as Santa Claus and CJ didn't know it was him until he kissed her.

questions.text: Charlie voted for the wrong candidate for President.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Donna was the person that voted for the wrong candidate. This is how she met Cmdr. Jack Reese (Christian Slater).

questions.text: Who had Amy's office fixed so that her pictures and doors would fall?
questions.explanation:
Josh.

	Amy realized it was Josh only after both doors fell. Josh got some guys to fix her walls so nothing would stay on them, and take the doors off their hinges.

questions.text: What was Toby eating for lunch, while both he and Charlie were watching tennis?
questions.explanation:
salad & a salad.

	"I don't know what kind of salad it is. I'm eating a salad, okay?  I'm doing it. Do I have to know the names? There's no difference between them. It's a bowl of weeds. Some of 'em have cheese. This isn't the kind with cheese. Does that answer your question?" Charlie told him he needed to get Andy to marry him. Toby agreed.

questions.text: Who did President Bartlett ask for a loan before the second poker game?
questions.explanation:
Ms. Fiderer

	She pulled out a wad of money and the President told her he hadn't gone to the bank and asked for a loan.

questions.text: What animal was put into Will's new office?
questions.explanation:
goat.

	"There are bicycles and goats in my office!" Will yells to CJ.

questions.text: What was Joe Quincy's parking space smeared with?
questions.explanation:
mayonnaise.

	"We never would have done it if we knew you were such a biscuit."

questions.text: Amy said it would take ___________ five minutes to figure out how Ritchie's going to win the election.
questions.explanation:
Donna.

	Amy said it would take Josh half that and maybe longer because the Mets lost last night and he'll need to focus.

questions.text: When Charlie was first introduced to the President, what was the President ranting and raving about losing?
questions.explanation:
glasses.

	Charlie knew where they were so Josh told him to speak up. Charlie did. This is how the relationship between Charlie and Jed began.

questions.text: How many job offers did Josh say Amy got after she was fired?
What did Leo say the White House was going to start?
What room did Ainsley Hayes enter thinking it was a bathroom?
questions.explanation:
Leo's closet.

	Bartlett: "I can't smoke in the White House, but she can pee in Leo' closet?"

questions.text: Who told Josh he had a cute butt?
questions.explanation:
Joey Lucas.

	Josh (to Kenny): "Kenny, that better had been Joey that said that."
